projects.title: Automotive – Epoxy Floor
projects.desc: High-durability epoxy flooring designed for heavy-vehicle traffic and oil resistance in automotive assembly plants.

projects.title: Textile – PU Coating
projects.desc: Seamless PU coating providing chemical and abrasion resistance for textile production areas with high humidity.

projects.title: Electronics – Anti-Static
projects.desc: Conductive epoxy floor solution ensuring static control in sensitive electronic manufacturing zones.

projects.title: Pharma – Hygienic Resin Floor
projects.desc: Antimicrobial resin flooring for pharmaceutical cleanrooms and processing units with HACCP compliance.

projects.title: Warehouse – Epoxy Coating
projects.desc: Industrial-grade epoxy coating providing dustproof and abrasion-resistant protection for warehouse floors.

projects.title: Food & Beverage – PU Concrete
projects.desc: PU concrete system with temperature tolerance for wet zones and food-grade manufacturing plants.
